roko

In 2013, Yarnspirations showed up on the net with the brands Bernat, Caron, Patons, Lily / Sugar'n Cream and Phentex.
pattern_sources.name: Yarnspirations

pattern_sources.notes:
*Next Steps Three is the essential instructional book featuring knit cardigans with fresh, modernized shapes, refined collars and stylish sleeve variations. (Patons Yarns)*

Eight patterns sizes XS to 5XL. Vest or cardigan (buttoned or zip front). With or without collar. Straight or flared sleeves.

Published in paper and electronic formats.
75 pages

ISBN-10: 1897272227
ISBN-13: 9781897272220
pattern_sources.author: Patons
pattern_sources.name: Patons #500838, Next Steps Three: Create Your Own Cardigan

pattern_sources.notes:
Site offers shopping choice of US or Canada.  Links to patterns may vary slightly because of this.

Mary Maxim is the largest mail order merchandiser of exclusive needlework and craft kits in North America. Mary Maxim began …with hand knit designs in the early 1950’s. Influenced by the beautiful wildlife in North America, Mary Maxim designed bulky outdoor zippered jackets to knit using the first easy-to-follow graph-style charts created. Designing has grown to include fashion in all weights of yarn, beautiful afghans to knit and crochet and decorative latch hook rugs. We also carry exclusive kits in needlepoint and beading and offer specially chosen kits from other craft companies. Our website offers much more than we could print in one catalog including paint-by-number kits, jigsaw puzzles and fabric.
We believe there is nothing better than the gift of creating something by hand. The satisfaction and sense of accomplishment one feels from making something and sharing it with others is a rewarding experience. We are honored to be a part of helping people find this happiness for over 60 years. We are dedicated to helping people discover their inner creativity.
pattern_sources.name: Mary Maxim Website
Mary Maxim #13345-6, Cardigan, Overalls and Hat
